title: Should You Wait to Buy Hades 2?
description:
Should you wait to play Hades 2? The Kinda Funny crew weighs in. 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snjpybhC7OE 

Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $30-off plus free shipping on their best-selling frame.
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.


FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
